title: Can Dell Inspiron 11 3000 play league?
body:
Hi Guys,
I am looking at the Dell Inspiron 11 3000 and I'm wondering if the specs are good enough to play league (I'm fine with low settings as it will not be my main computer, just casual travel use etc).

The Specs are as follows:

Intel® Celeron® Processor N3060 (2M Cache, up to 2.48 GHz)
Windows 10 Home with OneDrive 64-bit English
4GB Single Channel DDR3L 1600MHz
32GB eMMC Storage
Intel® HD Graphics

Thanks!

replies.body:
It meets the [minimum system requirements](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements/), so you should be good to go.

Let me know if you have any questions!

Hi Targons Blade,

Thanks for the answer.

I have chosen a better model of the Dell 11 3000 with:
Intel® Pentium ® Processor N3710 (2M Cache, up to 2.56 GHz)
4GB Single Channel DDR3L 1600MHz (4GBx1)

Will it be a lot better in playing the game?

Thank you!

Not likely. Your biggest limiting factor at the moment is the Pentium Processor. An upgrade at this point without raising the price much more would be jumping up to maybe an Intel Core i3 or i5 processor. However, if you're fine with sticking to simply *low settings*, you can stick with the Pentium.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
